info.description:
My 1st attempt at an XOR pattern roller! Bits representing coordinates are XOR'd then Modulo'd by 3 prime numbers.
[url=https://www.shadertoy.com/playlist/fX2cWm]PIXEL PLAYLIST[/url]
[url=https://www.shadertoy.com/playlist/s3BcD1]FRACTAL PLAYLIST[/url]
info.name: Alien Xor Carpet

renderpass.code:
/*
by Dom Mandy in 2023
*/
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 i) {
    int x = int(i /= 6.) ^ int(i.y + 4. * iTime);

    o = 1. - vec4(x%5, x%7, x%3, 0) / (4. - 3. * cos(iTime));
}
